summary: A tragicomedy about two listless friends who fall for the same girl and try to find out what they want from their life.
cast: Yoshiyoshi Arakawa|Yoshino Kimura|Yoshinori Okada|Yûka Arai|Noriko Eguchi|Takao Handa|Tsuyoshi Honma|Shima Ise|Keizô Kanie|Kitarô|Seminosuke Murasugi|Toshie Negishi|Ichirô Ogura|Kayoko Shiraishi|Naoki Tanaka|Hajime Taniguchi|Miyuki Torii|Taka Ôkubo
title: Zenzen daijobu
